text: This is a list of Brazilian television related events from 1999. ==Events== 10 May - Rede Manchete shut down. 15 November RedeTV! just launched. ==Debuts== ==Television shows== ===1970s=== *Turma da Mônica (1976-present) ===1990s=== *Malhação (1995-present) *Cocoricó (1996-present) ==Ending this year== ==Births== ==Deaths== ==See also== *1999 in Brazil
title: 1999 in Brazilian television
